page.title: 03THE AREA AROUND TREFONEN
page.content:
{THE AREA AROUND TREFONEN}
Trefonen is in the country side and is three miles away from Oswestry.Most of the village is on the west side of the main road.There are many house and roads going through the village.I live in Trefonen and go to Trefonen school. There are many farms and pubs scattered around.More and more houses are being built because people think it's convenient to live here because it's only three miles away from town. Some people think that all these houses being built spoil the country side,but if there weren't any houses Trefonen would be a thing of the past and it would die away.
